description: A prehistoric island on the Grand Line inhabited by dinosaurs and two giant warriors. The island is characterized by its ancient jungle environment and serves as the battleground for Dorry and Brogy's century-long duel.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 3's Wax Torture Platform
keyEvents.description: Mr. 3 sets up his elaborate Tokudai Candle Service Set torture device on Little Garden, trapping the Straw Hats and Brogy.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes the site of one of the arc's most dramatic confrontations.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Extreme Resolve
keyEvents.description: On Little Garden, Zoro prepares to cut off his own legs rather than die helplessly as a wax statue.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most iconic character moments in the series takes place on this island.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Rescue Arrival
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Usopp, and Karoo arrive at the wax platform on Little Garden just in time to save their friends.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the climactic battle of the Little Garden arc.

statusHistory.reason: Island remains inhabited by dinosaurs and serves as the giants' dueling ground
